CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, February 11, 1967, pg. 13, reads: "SPECIAL GUEST - William Lampkin, widower of the late Daisy E. Lampkin, for whom the awards dinner-dance was named, was a special guest at the second annual affair. He is seated here with Mrs. Robert L. Vann, left, Mrs. LeRoy Patrick and the Rev. LeRoy Patrick among others at his table."Accompanying article reads: "An overflow crowd packed the main ballroom of the Pick-Roosevelt Hotel recently when the Women's Auxiliary of the Pittsburgh Branch NAACP sponsored its second annual "Daisy E. Lampkin Award" Dinner-Dance..."
TitMainTitle: Group around banquet table, including Jessie Vann, William Lampkin, Norma Patrick, Rev. LeRoy Patrick, and Byrd Brown at Women's Auxiliary of NAACP dinner dance, Roosevelt Hotel
CatSubject_tab: Women--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Men--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.Roosevelt Hotel (Pittsburgh, Pa.)Balloons--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.National Association for the Advancement of Colored People.Decoration and ornament--Pennsylvania--Pittsburgh.
